Request.HotelDescription:
Located at the fringe of Orchard Road shopping belt, just 5 mins ride away. Botanica Garden, Chinatown and the business district are within easy access. Metropolitan Y is near enough yet also tranquil as it is set in a predominately residential area. The fully carpeted rooms are simple, the rooms have green striped curtains and green flora bedspread. Each room comes with colour TV cabled with network, mini-bar and IDD telephone. Attached bathrooms is simple and has standing showers. The only coffee house serves reasonably priced local and western cuisine in a causal setting. The building itself is tad worn and look more like a commercial building. The entrance open up to a medium size lobby with ample seating at the lobby lounge. Ideal for Singapore visitors seeking for a budget yet comfortable hotel. Hotel provides daily complimentary shuttle services to the Orchard MRT Station at scheduled timings. Guest could enjoyed complimentary wireless internet access at the lobby and the restaurant area. Self serviced coin operated launderette are available on top of the laundry service provided by the housekeeping.Hotel is managed by Metropolitan YMCA Singapore
sg 04/08
